settings.author: Elizabeth Johnson

settings.title: Cloak & Dagger
settings.desc: Experience the essence of Australia with our meticulously crafted Aussie sugarcane spirit, made from 100% local ingredients. Savor its smoothness and versatility, reflecting our dedication to excellence, as you create unforgettable moments with exceptional taste.

settings.title_2: Refreshing flavours of lemon myrtle & Tasmanian Pepperberry
settings.title: The Zesty Hound
settings.desc: Experience the exquisite blend of lemon myrtle and Tasmanian pepperberry in our premium gin, a tribute to dachshunds and taste exploration.

settings.title: White Stag Vodka
settings.desc: Experience the unrivaled purity and smoothness of our exceptional vodka, crafted from South Australian grapes for a flawless drinking experience.

settings.title: Locally Sourced Sugar Cane
settings.desc: Embrace the true essence of Australia with our rum, as we meticulously select and source our molasses from the best local producers. Each bottle is a testament to our commitment to using 100% Australian ingredients, ensuring a truly authentic and homegrown experience.

settings.title: Unparalled Flavour Symphony
settings.desc: Discover the essence of Australian rum, where boldness intertwines with complexity. Our rum delivers a unique flavor profile, distinct from Cuban counterparts with its intensified richness, while gracefully sidestepping the potent funkiness often found in Jamaican varieties. Prepare your taste buds for an extraordinary journey.

settings.title: Small Batch Artistry
settings.desc: Indulge in the pinnacle of craftsmanship with our meticulously created small-batch rum. Every exquisite batch is painstakingly crafted, filling no more than a single barrel to preserve its exceptional quality and unrivaled character.

settings.title: Unmatched Distillation Finesse
settings.desc: Embark on a refined tasting experience with our rum, meticulously distilled not once, twice, or thrice, but an astounding five times. This relentless pursuit of perfection ensures a flawlessly smooth and velvety texture, elevating our rum to the realm of premium quality. Savor each sip as it caresses your palate with unparalleled finesse and craftsmanship.

settings.section_heading: A Rich Tradition of Aussie Rum

settings.block_title: Cloak & Dagger is the real deal!
settings.block_description: I've been hooked since day one, and let me tell you, it just keeps getting better and better. The folks behind it put their heart and soul into every drop. Trust me, you don't want to miss out on this gem!
